flavor: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.
name: Reliquary Tower
text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {C}.

name: Replication Technique
text:
Demonstrate (When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it. Players may choose new targets for their copies.)
Create a token that's a copy of target permanent you control.

flavor: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.
name: Return to Dust
text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

name: Rionya, Fire Dancer
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create X tokens that are copies of another target creature you control, where X is one plus the number of instant and sorcery spells you've cast this turn. They gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Rousing Refrain
text:
Add {R} for each card in target opponent's hand. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. Exile Rousing Refrain with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{1}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

flavor:
"End this. What I seek is far greater."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
name: Rout
text:
You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

name: Ruin Grinder
text:
Menace
When Ruin Grinder dies, each player may discard their hand and draw seven cards.

name: Ruxa, Patient Professor
text:
Whenever Ruxa, Patient Professor enters the battlefield or attacks, return target creature card with no abilities from your graveyard to your hand.
Creatures you control with no abilities get +1/+1.
You may have creatures you control with no abilities assign their combat damage as though they weren't blocked.

flavor: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.
name: Sanctum Gargoyle
text:
Flying
When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor: When the last scrap of flesh is scoured away, the Curse of Wandering ends. Then the dead may sleep.
name: Scavenger Grounds
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Exile all cards from all graveyards.

name: Scholarship Sponsor
text: When Scholarship Sponsor enters the battlefield, each player who controls fewer lands than the player who controls the most lands searches their library for a number of basic land cards less than or equal to the difference, puts those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

name: Scrap Trawler
text: Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser converted mana cost.

flavor: An artificer once dropped one in a vault full of coins. She has yet to find it.
name: Sculpting Steel
text: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

flavor: Vulshok mana rituals echo the day when the red sun burst through Mirrodin's surface to take its place in the heavens.
name: Seething Song
text: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.

flavor:
"Reality, when broken down, is just math."
—Deekah, professor of fractal theory
name: Sequence Engine
text: {X}, {T}: Exile target creature card with mana value X from a graveyard. Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

flavor: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.
name: Serum Visions
text: Draw a card. Scry 2.

name: Shivan Reef
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

flavor: Its courtyards are lit during every hour of the day so that night may never fall within its walls.
name: Slayers' Stronghold
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance and haste until end of turn.

flavor: "Me? I'm just an innocent bystander."
name: Sly Instigator

flavor: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.
name: Sol Ring
text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

—Lukka
name: Spawning Kraken

Flying

—Sargis Haz, artificer
name: Steel Overseer
text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

flavor: A blazing sun that never sets.
name: Sun Titan

Vigilance
Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Sunbird's Invocation
text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. You may cast a spell with converted mana cost X or less from among cards revealed this way without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
